allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Rebrand app from Family Quiz App to Pruebas

- Update package name and metadata
- Add landing page with features, how it works, and CTA sections
- Update branding on login, signup, and header components

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(railway run npx prisma migrate deploy:*)

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Redesign dashboard and subject page with prominent level selection

- Dashboard: Show level progress bars with subtopics passed/total
- Dashboard: Prominent orange CTA when no level is selected
- Dashboard: Fetch and display level progress for each subject
- Subject page: Large blue gradient banner when no level set
- Subject page: Cleaner layout showing current level prominently
- Both pages encourage users to select a level to start tracking

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
